article_title: IRS Rehires Hundreds Of Problem Former Employees

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: IRS has hired back hundreds of former employees with serious conduct issues, including falsifying forms, peeking at confidential taxpayer records, and misusing IRS property. Even "Do Not Hire" label didn't stop them.
og.title: IRS Rehires Hundreds Of Problem Former Employees
